{{ZScriptNote}} '''[[Structs:SecPlane|SecPlane]]'''
native double '''GetChangedHeight'''(double ''hdiff'') const
==Usage== Used to calculate the new distance from the world origin the SecPlane would have were it shifted vertically by the given amount. Useful to check if a movement would cause the plane to exceed a threshold.
===Parameters=== *''hdiff'' - The value to shift by. Positive values shift up while negative values shift down.
===Return Value=== Returns the SecPlane's new distance from the world origin.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:SecPlane]]
